response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our flagship product to you. It's an investment that could significantly enhance your business operations and productivity. Given its value to you, we believe it's worth $15,000. To make this opportunity more appealing, we're offering it to you for $12,000. This price reflects our commitment to finding the right buyer who will truly appreciate and utilize the product to its full potential. We're confident it will be a valuable addition to your endeavors. Please let us know if you have any questions or if you're interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 12000}
